    DataHelper
    The DataHelper class contains methods for storing Stylus and StylusProfile objects in the database and retrieving them from the local SQLite database.

    STimerApp
    Represents the Stylus Timer application.
    STimerBaseActivity
    Base activity class extended by all activities in the app.
    STimerPreferences
    A singleton class that represents user details that are stored in SharedPreferences
    Stylus
    Stylus represents a single stylus/cartridge in the database.
    StylusProfile
    StylusProfile represents a single stylus profile in the database.
